entry.title: Page Config
entry.summary: Content before more comment is regarded as page excerpt.
entry.content:
Content before more comment is regarded as page excerpt.

Page Information

You can set page information in Markdownâ€™s Frontmatter.

  • The author is Ms.Hope.
  • The writing date is January 1, 2020
  • Category is "Guide"
  • Tags are "Page Config" and "Guide"

Page Content

You are free to write your Markdown here.

Assets

  • You can place images besides your Markdown files, but you should use relative links (i.e.: starting with ./) for them.

  • For images in .vuepress/public directory, please use absolute links (i.e.: starting with /) for them.

The theme contains a custom badge:

A dark blue badge text badge at the end of line.

Page Structure

This page should contain:

  • BreadCrumb
  • Title and information
  • TOC (Table of Contents)
  • Meta information including update time and contributors
  • Comments
  • Navbar
  • Sidebar
  • Footer
  • Back to top button

You can customize them in theme options and page frontmatter.

entry.title: Disabling layout and features
entry.summary: You can disable some function and layout on the page by setting the Frontmatter of the page.
entry.content:
You can disable some function and layout on the page by setting the Frontmatter of the page.

This page is an demo that disables the following features:

  • Navbar
  • Sidebar
  • Breadcrumb
  • Page information
  • Contributors
  • Edit link
  • Update time
  • Prev/Next link
  • Comment
  • Footer
  • Back to top button
